Title: Endgame
Director: Joaquim Dos Santos, Ki Hyun Ryu
Writer: Bryan Konietzko (creator), Michael Dante DiMartino (creator), Michael Dante DiMartino, Bryan Konietzko
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, P.J. Byrne, Seychelle Gabriel
Plot: The duel between Amon and Korra - will Korra be powerful enough to beat Amon?
